  • {link.NAME}
    • )}) }) //const links = response.json(); // var links = // [ // { CODE: 'BIMB1234', NAME: 'Bank Islam' }, // { CODE: 'MBBM1234', NAME: 'Maybank2U' }, // { CODE: 'AFFB1234', NAME: 'Affin Bank' }, // ]; // const listItems = links.map((link) => //
  • {link.NAME}
